title: Searge: 再次修复实体不可见问题
author: chyx
txt_content:
本帖最后由 chyx 于 2015-9-29 16:59 编辑 






searge.png (19.21 KB, 下载次数: 3)

下载附件

2015-9-29 16:03 上传






Searge: Remember the 3 bugs I fixed for invisible entities? There was a 4th bug, just fixed it. Thanks, @Dinnerbone, for helping me track it down.
Searge: 还记得我发现的3个让实体不可见的bug么？其实有第四个，已经修好了，感谢Dinnerbone（真名是Nathan Adams，mojang员工－chyx注）帮助我找到他。

来自Searge的推特
